The new NullProvider returned null for getStatus instead of OK

I fixed this and the editor opens without warning but it does not show any
content for remote files.

Q for Kai: Is it by intention that the NullProvider violates API?
getProgressMonitor (see IDocumentProviderExtension2) also returns null even
though it is not allowed to return null according to API.

Problem with linking document providers. Should be linked to a Java storage 
document provider by default. Same problem happens with normal text files when 
being opened from the repository view. Fixed in head.
